Desc.entry: The association was set up to pass on the views of the residents to the management of Northern Counties Housing Association. The estate is on the Abbeydale Park/Totley border and has 117 dwellings. Caters for all the views of all residents who want to make West View Lane a better place to live. Have worked in partnership with Northern Counties Housing Association, South Yorkshire Police, Streetforce and local Councillors to make West View Lane safer and cleaner, including improved lighting, extra police patrols and security fencing etc.

Telephone.entry: Office, after 5pm please leave a message

ProvisionDaysAndTimes.entry: Meetings are held every 4 months with a Housing Officer and a local Councillor present
